rdf:Description.dc:title: The triennial report 1986
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research.
International Board of Review (Alta.)
rdf:Description.dc:description: Each Triennial report has its own distinctive title.
Period covered by report ends Mar. 31.
2nd (1983/1986) Triennial report in 2 pts.; pt.2 consists of the [1st] (1980/1986) report of the International Board of Review.
3rd report called 1989 and includes statistics and financial summaries for 1986/1989.

4th ([1990/1993]) Triennial report called 3rd in error, and issued in 2 pts. ; pt. 1 includes financial statistics for 1989/1992 and student study guide in pocket; [pt.2] consists of the [2nd] (1987/1993) report of the International Board of Review.
Report for 1992/1995 also called 1996; report for 1996/1999 also called 1999.
[1st] (1980/83) Triennial report included with the 3rd ([1982/83]) Annual report.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research
International Board of Review (Alta.)
Medicine
Medicine
